name: Spirograph
tagLine: This is my submission for 2010 JS1K competition, which is about writing Javascript programs that fit in under 1k.

caption.heading: Test
caption.content: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.

description:
Creates random animated Spirograph patterns
Left click to add another random pattern on top
Press "C" to toggle colors
Press "F" to toggle fade effect
Press "P" to pause
Press "Space" to reset
Press "S" to save the picture
